about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Madhya Pradesh based ShreeOswal Seeds and Chemicals Limited is an ISO 22000:2005 certified company engaged in the business of production, processing, and sale of different kind of agricultural seeds like wheat,maize,soybean,mustard,etc.

The Company processes various kinds of seeds at its processing unit located at Neemuch, Madhya Pradesh. It processes 5 varieties of wheat seeds, 5 varieties of soya bean seeds, 3 varieties of Mustard seeds, 1 variety of black gram, 1 variety of corn seeds and 1 Variety of isabgol/psyllium. The products are marketed under the brand name of OSWAL. The majority of the sales are through its own Brand which contributed 66.00 %, 85.32 %, and 95.25 % respectively to the total sales for the financial year ended March 31, 2015, 2016, and 2017 respectively.

ShreeOswal has a diversified customer base covering states like Bihar, Jharkhand, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi, and Punjab. The Company operates through a network of distributors and dealers and has an association with more than 114 dealers and distributors.
Strengths of the Company-

1. A diverse portfolio of seeds products
2. Wide distribution network across many states
3. Established brand name of OSWAL

faqs.question: What is the ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO?
faqs.answer:
ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO is a SME IPO of 4576000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.90 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹26 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on June 7, 2018, and closes on June 12, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO opens on June 7, 2018 and closes on June 12, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO?
faqs.answer: ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO will be done on Friday, June 15, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, June 19, 2018. Check the ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The ShreeOswal Seeds & Chemicals IPO listing date is on Wednesday, June 20, 2018.
